job.title: Manufacturing Process Engineer - Electronics, PCBs
job.description:
Job Title: Manufacturing Process Engineer
Salary: $70-95K +/- based on experience
Location: Warrendale, PA - At times, you may have the option to work remote
Top Reasons to Work with Us
We are a a high technology company and a recognized world leader in the design and manufacture of state-of-the-art electron microscopy equipment.
What You Will Be Doing
The focus area of this position is on electronic system assembly and test. You will plan, direct, and coordinate the manufacturing process for our products. In addition, you will develop, evaluate, and improve manufacturing methods, utilizing knowledge of product design, materials/parts, tooling/production equipment capabilities, assembly methods, and quality control standards Provides manufacturing standards and process specifications to assure achievement of manufacturing and cost objectives.
What You Need for this Position
So, if you are a Manufacturing Process Engineer $70-95K with experience, please apply today!
Looking forward to receiving your resume through our website and going over the position with you. Clicking apply is the best way to apply, but you may also:
Ashley.Upchurch@CyberCoders.com
Ashley Upchurch - Lead Recruiter - CyberCoders
Applicants must be authorized to work in the U.S.
All qualified applicants will receive consideration for employment without regard to race, color, religion, sex, national origin, disability, protected veteran status, or any other characteristic protected by law.
- In compliance with federal law, all persons hired will be required to verify identity and eligibility to work in the United States and to complete the required employment eligibility verification document form upon hire.
